general.gigTitle: do API integration, development or fixing to your website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Always Turn Your Ideas Into Reality
sellerCard.description:
We are a team of enthusiastic youngsters and entrepreneurs who decided to convert their common experience into this company. We will be your development  expert with your demands and believe me it is a one-stop service provider company for your products, business, and services. Our prime goal is to create a marketplace in which you can easily find every service you need.

Our Services:-

•	Web Development
•	SEO optimization
•	Graphics Designing
•	Software Development
•	Virtual Assistant
•	Content Writing
•	Wordpress Designing
•	Php Development

description.content:
Are you looking to enhance the functionality of your website through seamless API integration? Do you need professional assistance in API development or fixing existing API-related issues? Look no further!


With our expertise in API integration, development, and troubleshooting, we offer comprehensive solutions tailored to meet your specific needs. Whether you're a business owner, a startup, or an individual, we are here to ensure smooth and efficient communication between your website and external services or applications.


Here's what I bring to the table:

  • Ecommerce integration, import&sync products/orders
  • Youtube API - search and fetch video data
  • Google APIs (gmail, calendar ,search,analytics, docs, etc)
  • Amazon web services
  • mailchimp / mandrill / getresponse / sendgrid
  • payment gateway integration, paypal/skrill/credit card/stripe
  • Wordpress API
  • woocommerce custom shipping / payment plugin
  • SMS services, send & receive sms and many more......


Why Choose Us:

With a wealth of experience in API integration, development, and problem-solving, we bring a deep understanding of industry best practices to deliver reliable and seamless solutions tailored to your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What types of API integrations do you specialize in?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I specialize in a wide range of API integrations, including but not limited to payment gateways, social media APIs, shipping providers, CRM systems, data analytics tools, and more. Feel free to discuss your specific requirements, and I'll be happy to assist you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you develop custom APIs for my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I have extensive experience in developing custom APIs tailored to your unique business needs. Whether you require a specific functionality or want to integrate with a custom service, I can design and implement a robust API solution for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I'm experiencing issues with my existing API integration. Can you help?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Certainly! I specialize in troubleshooting and fixing API-related problems. Whether it's debugging errors, addressing compatibility issues, or improving performance, I can analyze and resolve issues to ensure your API integration functions smoothly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide documentation and ongoing support?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, as part of my service, I offer comprehensive documentation to guide you through the integrated APIs and their usage. Additionally, I provide ongoing support to address any questions or concerns you may have after the integration is complete

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do we initiate the collaboration process?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, simply reach out to me through the contact options provided. We can discuss your project requirements, objectives, and timelines. I'll provide a customized solution and pricing details based on your specific needs.

packageList.title: Simple API
packageList.description: One API service, one GET & POST call, parse/format, response output and save to database or display

packageList.title: Standard API
packageList.description: Three API service, 3 GET & POST call, parse and format response JSON/XML output, save to database

packageList.title: Complete API project
packageList.description: 5 API service, 5 GET/ POST/PUT call, parse and format response JSON/XML output, save to database

reviews.comment: Great work, very professional and creative with his approach to solving issues.

Shapito was an absolute pleasure to work with in software development. His professionalism and attention to detail were impressive, and his code expertise truly shined. Furthermore, he delivered on time, communicated fluently, and was incredibly polite throughout the process. 👍
Well done. Looking forward to working together in future!
